name: swipe
description: Swipe is a modern dating app that makes finding meaningful connections easy. With a sleek interface and powerful matching algorithm, you can swipe to show interest, chat in real-time, and discover new people nearby. Whether you're looking for love, friendship, or casual connections, Swipe brings you closer to someone special with every swipe.

scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
